00023         {
00024             return (this->_serverAddress == server.getServerAddress() &&
00025                     this->_serverPort == server.getServerPort() &&
00026                     this->_serviceIds == server.getServiceIds() &&
00027                     this->_serverId == server.getServerId());
00028         }
